dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is a valuable extension of the ways in which patients with chronic diseases can be contacted Patients can easily contact their caregivers within the safe environment of the digital waiting room Telemedicine especially offers an advantage for those forms of care where the visual aspect is important Care should be taken with respect to its implementation into the disease management process with careful synchronisation between all involved parties e g patient caregiver and organisation
[Telemedicine for patients with chronic intestinal failure].
